comment: Smart Data Models - ExcELIN2 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcELIN2/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Detailed Excitation System Model - ELIN (VATECH).  This model represents an all-static excitation system. A PI voltage controller establishes a desired field current set point for a proportional current controller. The integrator of the PI controller has a follow-up input to match its signal to the present field current.  Power system stabilizer models used in conjunction with this excitation system model: PssELIN2, PssIEEE2B, Pss2B.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efdbas
contents.comment: Gain (Efdbas).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: iefmax
contents.comment: Limiter (Iefmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: iefmax2
contents.comment: Minimum open circuit excitation voltage (Iefmax2).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: iefmin
contents.comment: Limiter (Iefmin).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k1
contents.comment: Voltage regulator input gain (K1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k1ec
contents.comment: Voltage regulator input limit (K1ec).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k2
contents.comment: Gain (K2).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k3
contents.comment: Gain (K3).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k4
contents.comment: Gain (K4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd1
contents.comment: Voltage controller derivative gain (Kd1).  Typical Value = 34.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke2
contents.comment: Gain (Ke2).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ketb
contents.comment: Gain (Ketb).  Typical Value = 0.06. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pid1max
contents.comment: Controller follow up gain (PID1max).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seve1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve1, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve1]).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seve2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve2, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve2]).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tb1
contents.comment: Voltage controller derivative washout time constant (Tb1).  Typical Value = 12.45. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Time constant (Te).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: te2
contents.comment: Time Constant (Te2).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: ti1
contents.comment: Controller follow up dead band (Ti1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ti3
contents.comment: Time constant (Ti3).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: ti4
contents.comment: Time constant (Ti4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tr4
contents.comment: Time constant (Tr4).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: upmax
contents.comment: Limiter (Upmax).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: upmin
contents.comment: Limiter (Upmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve1
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve1).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve2
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xp
contents.comment: Excitation transformer effective reactance (Xp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
